amendment.description: To provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct various projects for improvements to rivers and harbors of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 909 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 909 proposed by Senator Hoeven.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 909 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 909 proposed by Senator Hoeven.
